verses.text: And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w*, O \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, the \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w* and \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w* which I \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* in your \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, that ye may \w learn|strong="H3925"\w* them, and \w keep|strong="H8104"\w*, and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* them.\f + \fr 5.1 \ft keep…: Heb. keep to do them\f*
The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w made|strong="H3772"\w* a \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* with us in \w Horeb|strong="H2722"\w*.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w made|strong="H3772"\w* not this \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* with our \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, but with \w us|strong="H0587"\w*, \add even\add* us, who \add are\add* all of \w us|strong="H0428"\w* here \w alive|strong="H2416"\w* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w talked|strong="H1696"\w* with you \w face|strong="H6440"\w* to \w face|strong="H6440"\w* in the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* out of the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*,

(I \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* between the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* and you at that \w time|strong="H6256"\w*, to \w shew|strong="H5046"\w* you the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: for ye were \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* by \w reason|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, and went not \w up|strong="H5927"\w* into the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w*;) \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

¶ I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, which brought thee \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, from the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w bondage|strong="H5650"\w*.\f + \fr 5.6 \ft bondage: Heb. servants\f*
Thou shalt have none \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me.

Thou shalt not \w make|strong="H6213"\w* thee \add any\add* graven \w image|strong="H6459"\w*, \add or\add* any \w likeness|strong="H8544"\w* \add of any thing\add* that \add is\add* in \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* \w above|strong="H4605"\w*, or that \add is\add* in the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* beneath, or that \add is\add* in the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* beneath the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*:

Thou shalt not bow \w down|strong="H7812"\w* thyself unto them, nor \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* them: for I the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add am\add* a \w jealous|strong="H7067"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*, \w visiting|strong="H6485"\w* the \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* of the \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* upon the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* unto the \w third|strong="H8029"\w* and \w fourth|strong="H7256"\w* \add generation\add* of them that \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* me,

And \w shewing|strong="H6213"\w* \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* unto \w thousands|strong="H0505"\w* of them that \w love|strong="H0157"\w* me and \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* my \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*.

Thou shalt not \w take|strong="H5375"\w* the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* in \w vain|strong="H7723"\w*: for the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* will not hold \add him\add* \w guiltless|strong="H5352"\w* that \w taketh|strong="H5375"\w* his \w name|strong="H8034"\w* in \w vain|strong="H7723"\w*.

\w Keep|strong="H8104"\w* the \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* to \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* it, as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* thee.
\w Six|strong="H8337"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* thou shalt \w labour|strong="H5647"\w*, and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* all thy \w work|strong="H4399"\w*:

But the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \add is\add* the \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: \add in it\add* thou shalt not \w do|strong="H6213"\w* any \w work|strong="H4399"\w*, thou, nor thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, nor thy \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, nor thy \w manservant|strong="H5650"\w*, nor thy \w maidservant|strong="H0519"\w*, nor thine \w ox|strong="H7794"\w*, nor thine \w ass|strong="H2543"\w*, nor any of thy \w cattle|strong="H0929"\w*, nor thy \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w* that \add is\add* within thy \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*; that thy \w manservant|strong="H5650"\w* and thy \w maidservant|strong="H0519"\w* may \w rest|strong="H5117"\w* as well as thou.

And \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* that thou wast a \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and \add that\add* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* thee out thence through a \w mighty|strong="H2389"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* and by a stretched \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w arm|strong="H2220"\w*: therefore the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* thee to \w keep|strong="H6213"\w* the \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

¶ \w Honour|strong="H3513"\w* thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w* and thy \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*, as the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* thee; that thy \w days|strong="H3117"\w* may be \w prolonged|strong="H0748"\w*, and that it may go \w well|strong="H3190"\w* with thee, in the \w land|strong="H0127"\w* which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* thee.
Thou shalt not \w kill|strong="H7523"\w*.
Neither shalt thou commit \w adultery|strong="H5003"\w*.
Neither shalt thou \w steal|strong="H1589"\w*.
Neither shalt thou \w bear|strong="H6030"\w* \w false|strong="H7723"\w* \w witness|strong="H5707"\w* against thy \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w*.

Neither shalt thou \w desire|strong="H2530"\w* thy \w neighbour’s|strong="H7453"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, neither shalt thou \w covet|strong="H0183"\w* thy \w neighbour’s|strong="H7453"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, his \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, or his \w manservant|strong="H5650"\w*, or his \w maidservant|strong="H0519"\w*, his \w ox|strong="H7794"\w*, or his \w ass|strong="H2543"\w*, or any \add thing\add* that \add is\add* thy \w neighbour’s|strong="H7453"\w*.

¶ These \w words|strong="H1697"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto all your \w assembly|strong="H6951"\w* in the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* out of the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, of the \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w*, and of the thick \w darkness|strong="H6205"\w*, with a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*: and he added no \w more|strong="H3254"\w*. And he \w wrote|strong="H3789"\w* them in \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w tables|strong="H3871"\w* of \w stone|strong="H0068"\w*, and \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* them unto me.

And it came to pass, when ye \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* out of the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w*, (for the \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* did \w burn|strong="H1197"\w* with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*,) that ye came \w near|strong="H7126"\w* unto me, \add even\add* all the \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* of your \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w*, and your \w elders|strong="H2205"\w*;

And ye \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold, the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w shewed|strong="H7200"\w* us his \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* and his \w greatness|strong="H1433"\w*, and we have \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* his \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* out of the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*: we have \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w* that \w God|strong="H0430"\w* doth \w talk|strong="H1696"\w* with \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, and he \w liveth|strong="H2425"\w*.

Now therefore why should we \w die|strong="H4191"\w*? for this \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* will \w consume|strong="H0398"\w* us: if we \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w* any \w more|strong="H3254"\w*, then we shall \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.\f + \fr 5.25 \ft hear: Heb. add to hear\f*

For who \add is there of\add* all \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*, that hath \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the \w living|strong="H2416"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w* out of the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, as we \add have\add*, and \w lived|strong="H2421"\w*?

Go thou \w near|strong="H7126"\w*, and \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* all that the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w* shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: and \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* thou unto us all that the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w* shall \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto thee; and we will \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \add it\add*, and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \add it\add*.

And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of your \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, when ye \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto me; and the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, I have \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of this \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, which they have \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* unto thee: they have \w well|strong="H3190"\w* said all that they have \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*.

O that there were \w such|strong="H2088"\w* \w an|strong="H4310"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* in \w them|strong="H5414"\w*, that they would \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* me, and \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* all my \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* \w always|strong="H3117"\w*, that it might be \w well|strong="H3190"\w* with them, and with their \w children|strong="H1121"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*!
\w Go|strong="H3212"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* to them, \w Get|strong="H7725"\w* you into your \w tents|strong="H0168"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w*.

But as for thee, \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* thou here by \w me|strong="H5978"\w*, and I will \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto thee all the \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*, and the \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w*, and the \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*, which thou shalt \w teach|strong="H3925"\w* them, that they may \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \add them\add* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which I \w give|strong="H5414"\w* them to \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* it.

Ye shall \w observe|strong="H8104"\w* to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* therefore as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* you: ye shall not turn \w aside|strong="H5493"\w* to the right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* or to the \w left|strong="H8040"\w*.

Ye shall \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* in all the \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* you, that ye may \w live|strong="H2421"\w*, and \add that it may be\add* \w well|strong="H2895"\w* with you, and \add that\add* ye may \w prolong|strong="H0748"\w* \add your\add* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which ye shall \w possess|strong="H3423"\w*.
